clusterList.phrase: we invented for our selves other gods of various kinds

we are belief-making machines we would invent religion within a month if it did not exist it explains meaning and the meaning of life how do we want to deal with sorrow and hurt the stories of religion play a very important social function there is no question to me that the our brains are built to generate these ideas for social purposes
we believe in it all of it comes from our lord
